lesson.subtitle: Central Ukraine - Kyiv, Poltava, and Cossack Heritage
lesson.description: Learner can discuss Central Ukraine's regions and historical significance
objectives: Learner can discuss Central Ukraine's regions and historical significance
Learner can understand authentic texts about Kyiv, Poltava, and Cherkasy
Learner can use regional vocabulary to describe Central Ukrainian culture
Learner can explain the connection between Central Ukraine and Cossack heritage
